## Vector4.set() method

Updates the current Vector4 coordinates with the given floats.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
set(x: number, y: number, z: number, w: number): Vector4;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  x | <code>number</code> | float to set from |
|  y | <code>number</code> | float to set from |
|  z | <code>number</code> | float to set from |
|  w | <code>number</code> | float to set from |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Vector4`

the updated Vector4.
